verses.kjv: Also, thou son of man, prophesy unto the mountains of Israel, and say, Ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the LORD:
verses.ct: "Now, son of man, prophesy to the mountains of Israel and say, 'Mountains of Israel, listen to the word of the LORD:'

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because the enemy hath said against you, Aha, even the ancient high places are ours in possession:
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: Because the enemy has gloated over you, saying, 'The ancient hilltops now belong to us!'

verses.kjv: Therefore prophesy and say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you up on every side, that ye might be a possession unto the residue of the heathen, and ye are taken up in the lips of talkers, and are an infamy of the people:
verses.ct: So prophesy and say, this is what the Lord GOD says: Because they have devastated you and attacked you from every direction so that you would become the property of the surrounding nations, and because you have become the subject of people's gossip and the target of slander among the peoples —

verses.kjv: Therefore, ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord GOD; Thus saith the Lord GOD to the mountains, and to the hills, to the rivers, and to the valleys, to the desolate wastes, and to the cities that are forsaken, which became a prey and derision to the residue of the heathen that are round about;
verses.ct: therefore, mountains of Israel, listen to the word of the Lord GOD. This is what the Lord GOD says to the mountains and hills, to the ravines and valleys, to the ruined wastelands and abandoned cities that have become plunder and an object of mockery for the surrounding nations —

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Surely in the fire of my jealousy have I spoken against the residue of the heathen, and against all Idumea, which have appointed my land into their possession with the joy of all their heart, with despiteful minds, to cast it out for a prey.
verses.ct: this is what the Lord GOD says: I have certainly spoken in the fire of my passion against the rest of the nations and against all of Edom, who claimed my land as their own possession with wholehearted glee and with contempt in their souls, seizing it as plunder.

verses.kjv: Prophesy therefore concerning the land of Israel, and say unto the mountains, and to the hills, to the rivers, and to the valleys, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I have spoken in my jealousy and in my fury, because ye have borne the shame of the heathen:
verses.ct: So prophesy about the land of Israel and say to the mountains and hills, to the ravines and valleys, this is what the Lord GOD says: Look, I have spoken in my passionate anger because you have endured the disgrace of the nations.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; I have lifted up mine hand, Surely the heathen that are about you, they shall bear their shame.
verses.ct: So this is what the Lord GOD says: I have raised my hand and sworn an oath — the nations surrounding you will certainly bear their own disgrace.

verses.kjv: But ye, O mountains of Israel, ye shall shoot forth your branches, and yield your fruit to my people of Israel; for they are at hand to come.
verses.ct: But you, mountains of Israel, will put out your branches and produce your fruit for my people Israel, because they are about to return.

verses.kjv: For, behold, I am for you, and I will turn unto you, and ye shall be tilled and sown:
verses.ct: Look, I am on your side, and I will turn my attention to you. You will be plowed and planted again.

verses.kjv: And I will multiply men upon you, all the house of Israel, even all of it: and the cities shall be inhabited, and the wastes shall be builded:
verses.ct: I will fill you with people — the entire house of Israel, all of them. The cities will be inhabited again, and the ruins will be rebuilt.

verses.kjv: And I will multiply upon you man and beast; and they shall increase and bring fruit: and I will settle you after your old estates, and will do better unto you than at your beginnings: and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.ct: I will increase both people and livestock on you. They will multiply and be fruitful. I will resettle you as you were before, and I will make things even better for you than they were at the start. Then you will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: Yea, I will cause men to walk upon you, even my people Israel; and they shall possess thee, and thou shalt be their inheritance, and thou shalt no more henceforth bereave them of men.
verses.ct: Yes, I will bring people — my people Israel — to live on you again. They will possess you, and you will be their homeland, and you will never again rob them of their children.

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because they say unto you, Thou land devourest up men, and hast bereaved thy nations;
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: Because people say about you, 'You are a land that devours its people and robs your nation of its children' —

verses.kjv: Therefore thou shalt devour men no more, neither bereave thy nations any more, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.ct: you will no longer devour people or rob your nation of its children, declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: Neither will I cause men to hear in thee the shame of the heathen any more, neither shalt thou bear the reproach of the people any more, neither shalt thou cause thy nations to fall any more, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.ct: I will no longer let you hear the insults of the nations, and you will no longer endure the scorn of the peoples, and you will no longer cause your nation to stumble, declares the Lord GOD."

verses.kjv: Moreover the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me again, saying,

verses.kjv: Son of man, when the house of Israel dwelt in their own land, they defiled it by their own way and by their doings: their way was before me as the uncleanness of a removed woman.
verses.ct: "Son of man, when the house of Israel lived in their own land, they made it unclean by their behavior and their actions. Their conduct in my sight was like the impurity of a woman during her period.

verses.kjv: Wherefore I poured my fury upon them for the blood that they had shed upon the land, and for their idols wherewith they had polluted it:
verses.ct: So I poured out my anger on them because of the blood they had spilled on the land and because of the idols with which they had contaminated it.

verses.kjv: And I scattered them among the heathen, and they were dispersed through the countries: according to their way and according to their doings I judged them.
verses.ct: I scattered them among the nations, and they were dispersed throughout the countries. I judged them according to their behavior and their actions.

verses.kjv: And when they entered unto the heathen, whither they went, they profaned my holy name, when they said to them, These are the people of the LORD, and are gone forth out of his land.
verses.ct: But wherever they went among the nations, they brought dishonor to my holy name, because people said about them, 'These are the LORD's people, yet they had to leave his land.'

verses.kjv: But I had pity for mine holy name, which the house of Israel had profaned among the heathen, whither they went.
verses.ct: I was concerned for my holy name, which the house of Israel had dishonored among the nations wherever they went.

verses.kjv: Therefore say unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord GOD; I do not this for your sakes, O house of Israel, but for mine holy name’s sake, which ye have profaned among the heathen, whither ye went.
verses.ct: So tell the house of Israel, this is what the Lord GOD says: I am not doing this for your benefit, house of Israel, but for the sake of my holy name, which you have dishonored among the nations wherever you went.

verses.kjv: And I will sanctify my great name, which was profaned among the heathen, which ye have profaned in the midst of them; and the heathen shall know that I am the LORD, saith the Lord GOD, when I shall be sanctified in you before their eyes.
verses.ct: I will demonstrate the holiness of my great name, which has been dishonored among the nations — the name you dishonored among them. The nations will know that I am the LORD, declares the Lord GOD, when I demonstrate my holiness through you right in front of them.

verses.kjv: For I will take you from among the heathen, and gather you out of all countries, and will bring you into your own land.
verses.ct: I will take you out from among the nations, gather you from all the countries, and bring you back to your own land.

verses.kjv: Then will I sprinkle clean water upon you, and ye shall be clean: from all your filthiness, and from all your idols, will I cleanse you.
verses.ct: I will sprinkle clean water on you, and you will be clean. I will purify you from all your contamination and from all your idols.

verses.kjv: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you: and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you an heart of flesh.
verses.ct: I will give you a new heart and place a new spirit inside you. I will remove the heart of stone from your body and give you a heart of flesh.

verses.kjv: And I will put my spirit within you, and cause you to walk in my statutes, and ye shall keep my judgments, and do them.
verses.ct: I will place my spirit inside you and move you to follow my laws. You will carefully obey my regulations and carry them out.

verses.kjv: And ye shall dwell in the land that I gave to your fathers; and ye shall be my people, and I will be your God.
verses.ct: You will live in the land that I gave to your ancestors. You will be my people, and I will be your God.

verses.kjv: I will also save you from all your uncleannesses: and I will call for the corn, and will increase it, and lay no famine upon you.
verses.ct: I will rescue you from all your uncleanness. I will command the grain to be abundant and increase it, and I will never again send famine on you.

verses.kjv: And I will multiply the fruit of the tree, and the increase of the field, that ye shall receive no more reproach of famine among the heathen.
verses.ct: I will make the trees produce abundantly and the fields yield plentifully, so that you will never again suffer the disgrace of famine among the nations.

verses.kjv: Then shall ye remember your own evil ways, and your doings that were not good, and shall lothe yourselves in your own sight for your iniquities and for your abominations.
verses.ct: Then you will remember your wicked ways and your actions that were not good, and you will be disgusted with yourselves because of your sins and your detestable practices.

verses.kjv: Not for your sakes do I this, saith the Lord GOD, be it known unto you: be ashamed and confounded for your own ways, O house of Israel.
verses.ct: I want you to understand that I am not doing this for your benefit, declares the Lord GOD. Be ashamed and humiliated because of your ways, house of Israel.

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; In the day that I shall have cleansed you from all your iniquities I will also cause you to dwell in the cities, and the wastes shall be builded.
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: On the day I cleanse you from all your sins, I will resettle you in the cities, and the ruins will be rebuilt.

verses.kjv: And the desolate land shall be tilled, whereas it lay desolate in the sight of all that passed by.
verses.ct: The abandoned land will be farmed again, instead of lying desolate for every passerby to see.

verses.kjv: And they shall say, This land that was desolate is become like the garden of Eden; and the waste and desolate and ruined cities are become fenced, and are inhabited.
verses.ct: People will say, 'This land that was once devastated has become like the garden of Eden! The ruined, abandoned, and demolished cities are now fortified and full of people.'

verses.kjv: Then the heathen that are left round about you shall know that I the LORD build the ruined places, and plant that that was desolate: I the LORD have spoken it, and I will do it.
verses.ct: Then the nations that remain around you will know that I, the LORD, have rebuilt what was destroyed and replanted what was desolate. I, the LORD, have spoken, and I will do it.

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; I will yet for this be enquired of by the house of Israel, to do it for them; I will increase them with men like a flock.
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: I will also allow the house of Israel to ask me to do this for them — I will make their people as numerous as a flock.

verses.kjv: As the holy flock, as the flock of Jerusalem in her solemn feasts; so shall the waste cities be filled with flocks of men: and they shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.ct: Like the sacred flocks, like the flocks filling Jerusalem during her appointed festivals — that is how the ruined cities will be filled with flocks of people. Then they will know that I am the LORD."
